an10.2:1.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam silavato silasampannassa avippatisaro uppajjati.
an10.2:1.6: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam avippatisarissa pamojjam jayati.
an10.2:1.9: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam pamuditassa piti uppajjati.
an10.2:1.12: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam pitimanassa kayo passambhati.
an10.2:1.15: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam passaddhakayo sukham vediyati.
an10.2:1.18: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an10.2:1.21: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam samahito yathabhutam janati passati.
an10.2:1.22: Yathabhutam, bhikkhave, janato passato na cetanaya karaniyam:
an10.2:1.24: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam yathabhutam janam passam nibbindati virajjati.
an10.2:1.25: Nibbinnassa, bhikkhave, virattassa na cetanaya karaniyam:
an10.2:1.27: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam nibbinno viratto vimuttinanadassanam sacchikaroti.
an10.2:2.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, nibbidavirago vimuttinanadassanattho vimuttinanadassananisamso;
an10.2:2.10: Iti kho, bhikkhave, dhamma dhamme abhisandenti, dhamma dhamme paripurenti apara param gamanaya”ti.
